parameters.formTitle: Create a UGC-like video from a Shopify product

values.placeholder: Add the full shopify URL here
What search term we should use to find a product?

nodes.name: Get the products from the Shopify store

assignments.name: SHOPIFY_URL
assignments.value: ={{   ((u) => {   let s = u.trim();   if (!/^https?:\/\//i.test(s)) s = 'https://' + s;   const parts = s.split('/');   return parts[0] + '//' + parts[2]; })($('On form submission').first().json['Shopify store URL'])  }}

parameters.completionMessage: We are generating the video for you, it could take up to 5 minutes

parameters.text:
=<Instructions>
I'm working on creating a UGC (user generated content) ad for a fashion ecommerce product item.

Our goal is to create a scene, where we can build a 5s long video that can easily be looped. That means, that the background should be still, and the character should be standing and talking to the camera.

Create the following items:

1. An image prompt

Create an image prompt, that describes the background, and since the AI image generator receives the reference image, it should say to wear the item from the image. Have the character stand at a very slight angle to the camera. Give the character a slight smile. Include in the image prompt, that any text, illustration, signature, frame or border should be removed. Also include, that the main character should be looking into the camera.

2. Dialogue for the main character

Create a dialogue that's about 550 characters long, and talks about the item. Use the product description, and the reference image.
The dialogue should sound natural, like an amateur product review.

3. Video prompt
A detailed description of the 5s long clip, that will be looped. The character should be visibly speaking in the video, with a slight smile.
The emotion of the character should not change during the full length of the clip.
We want the character to be in a very natural pose, arms resting naturally at the sides, both feet planted on the ground.
Start the clip with the weight on one foot and shift it to the other one very very slowly and naturally, then shift it back.
Include in the video prompt, that nothing should move behind the character, should be no lifting of the feet, and no excessive turning, knee bending, arm movements, or any other odd movements. 
Include in the video prompt that the clip should contain minimal camera movement, zoom in or out. 

4. The sex of the person on the attached image

</Instructions>

<FashionItem>
# {{ $('Setup product').item.json.product.title }}

{{ $('Markdown').item.json.body }}
</FashionItem>

nodes.name: Structured Output Parser for prompt generation

parameters.content:
# Pick your choice of LLM âš ï¸
âš ï¸ Make sure to deactive/delete the rest of the LLMs after selecting one

# How to set up this automation?

## Make sure to use n8n `1.97.1` or higher, lower versions could break the stuctured output node

## 1. Setup the two LLM nodes, select a multimodal (!) LLM - I recommend using GPT 4.1 or GPT 4.1-mini. Make sure to disable the rest of the chat nodes.
## 2. Find all the `Start generating the ...` and `Get the ... status` nodes, and setup your fal.ai authentication. Make sure to use this format in the header authentication: `key YOUR_KEY` - first writing `key` then a space and then pasting in your API key.

nodes.name: Set the voice based on sex

assignments.name: selected_images

parameters.errorMessage: There was no usable image for the selected product
No images found for the selected product

parameters.text:
=You are an AI system reviewing ecommerce product images. Your goal is to identify and flag images that contain significant explanatory or descriptive text overlaid on the image, such as labels, callouts, arrows with text, or UI elements that describe product features directly on the image (for example: "Waist Tie-up", "Thread detailing", "Checkered pattern", diagrams, or instructions).

Allow for:

Small logos, watermarks, or brand signatures that are unobtrusive and do not describe product features.
Do NOT allow:

Overlaid text that explains, labels, or calls out product details/features, UI labels, instructions, or prominent text boxes/arrows on the main image content.
Your output should be:

"Flagged" if the image has any explanatory or callout text as described above.
"Allowed" if the image only contains a logo, watermark, or signature.
Examples:

If the image contains callouts like "Checkered pattern" or "Thread detailing" with arrows pointing to those features, respond with "Flagged".
If the only text is a small brand logo or signature, respond with "Allowed".
